Msg_UpdateNote: Note: Users updating from versions below 3.5 must re-run setupOCR to ensure proper functionality.
Lbl_ShowIconSignal: Show Icon Signal When Start OCR
Msg_ServerGuide1: This feature allows you to create a local hotspot server. The server is responsible for displaying translated text retrieved from the RSTGameTranslation app. You can access the server from any device within the LAN network.
Msg_ServerGuide2: This feature allows you to use your phone as a screen to view translations, which is useful for people who do not use multiple monitors.
Msg_CreateProfileGuide: To create a new profile, enter the profile name in the 'Profile Name' field and click the 'Create Profile' button.
Msg_ProfileNameNote: Important: Profile name must be unaccented characters and no spaces, for example: GodOfWar, GTAV, TheLastOfUs, etc
Msg_RemoveProfileGuide: To remove a new profile, select the profile name in the combobox 'Select Profile' and click the 'Remove Profile' button.
Msg_UpdateProfileGuide: To update a new profile, select the profile name in the combobox 'Select Profile' and click the 'Update Profile' button. This will update all current configs in settings to the profile you choose.
Msg_LoadProfileGuide: To load a new profile, select the profile name in the combobox 'Select Profile' and click the 'Load Profile' button. This will apply all configurations from the selected profile to your current settings.
Tip_ExcludeCharName: The application will automatically exclude character's name in the dialogue. The required format is <character name>: <dialogue>
Msg_RoboticVoicesGuide: To install robotic language voices, go to Settings > Time & language > Speech > Add voices. Select the language you want, click the Add button then wait for the voice to be added to the system. After that, reset the RstGameTranslation application to display the new voices.
Msg_NaturalVoicesStep3: 3. Natural voices will appear in the combo box above marked with (SAPI), while robotic voices will be marked with (UWP).
Msg_NaturalVoicesStep4: 4. For voice languages not available in the list, please select the Multilingual voices in the combo box. These voices can speak multiple languages in addition to their main language.
Msg_Disclaimer: This application is provided as-is without warranty. Please report any bugs through the GitHub repository or Discord.

Msg_ConfirmRemovePhrase: Are you sure you want to remove the phrase '{0}'?
Msg_MultiSelectionGuide:
When this feature is enabled, you can select multiple areas to translate by clicking the SelectArea button

Each selection corresponds to one translation area

To switch between translation areas, press ALT+number (number from 1 to 5)

The numbers correspond to the areas you have created; the first selected area is 1, and it increases up to 5
Msg_ConfirmRemoveServer: Are you sure you want to remove this hotspot server?
Msg_AutoOCRDisabled: If you disable this feature, the application will not automatically translate text. To trigger translation of the selected area, click the Start button (default ALT+G). To clear the overlay and get a new translation, click the Stop button (default ALT+G)
TranslationAreaSelector_Instruction: Select translation region: Drag the mouse to select the area you want to translate
Msg_LanguagePackInstallGuide:
Language pack is not installed.

To install the corresponding language pack, please follow these steps:

Step 1: Press "Windows + S" button, type "language settings" and press Enter button.

Step 2: Click on "Add a language" button.

Step 3: Type "{0}" to search.

Step 4: Click "Next" button, uncheck all option and click "install".

Wait for language package install complete and retry

Msg_ServerConnectionError:
Connection Error: AI server not running at {0}

Have you been click SetupServer button yet (only need to do this once during initial setup)?

If you have not been run, please click the SetupServer button, wait for finish and try again.

Some fix you can try:

1. Click StopServer button to stop server then Click StartServer button to start server
2. Close and reopen application

NotificationMessage_TranslationStarted_D: OCR and Translation are now active.

Tip_VolumeThreshold: Volume threshold to detect voice (0.001-0.1). Lower = more sensitive.
Tip_SilenceDuration: Milliseconds of silence before processing audio (100-2000).
Tip_MaxBufferSamples: Maximum seconds of audio to buffer (1-10). Higher = longer phrases captured.
Msg_WhisperServiceRunning: Local Whisper service is running. Please stop it before changing the audio processing model.
